SEARCH
Package org.pipservices4.messaging.queues

Interface IMessageQueue

All Superinterfaces:
org.pipservices4.components.run.IClosable, org.pipservices4.components.run.IOpenable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CachedMessageQueue, MemoryMessageQueue, MessageQueue
public interface IMessageQueue extends org.pipservices4.components.run.IOpenable
Interface for asynchronous message queues.

Not all queues may implement all the methods. Attempt to call non-supported method will result in NotImplemented exception. To verify if specific method is supported consult with MessagingCapabilities.

See Also:
  • MessageEnvelope
  • MessagingCapabilities

    • getName

      String getName()
      Gets the queue name
      Returns:
      the queue name.

    • getCapabilities

      MessagingCapabilities getCapabilities()
      Gets the queue capabilities
      Returns:
      the queue's capabilities object.

    • readMessageCount

      int readMessageCount()
      Gets the current number of messages in the queue to be delivered.
      Returns:
      number of messages.

    • send

      void send(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context, MessageEnvelope envelop) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Sends a message into the queue.
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      envelop - a message envelop to be sent.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.

    • sendAsObject

      void sendAsObject(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context, String messageType, Object message) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Sends an object into the queue. Before sending the object is converted into JSON string and wrapped in a MessageEnvelope.
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      messageType - a message type
      message - an object value to be sent
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.
      See Also:
      • send(IContext, MessageEnvelope)

    • peek

      MessageEnvelope peek(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Peeks a single incoming message from the queue without removing it. If there are no messages available in the queue it returns null.
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      Returns:
      a message envelop object.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.

    • peekBatch

      List<MessageEnvelope> peekBatch(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context, int messageCount) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Peeks multiple incoming messages from the queue without removing them. If there are no messages available in the queue it returns an empty list.
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      messageCount - a maximum number of messages to peek.
      Returns:
      a list with messages.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.

    • receive

      MessageEnvelope receive(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context, long waitTimeout) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Receives an incoming message and removes it from the queue.
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      waitTimeout - a timeout in milliseconds to wait for a message to come.
      Returns:
      a message envelop object.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.

    • renewLock

      void renewLock(MessageEnvelope message, long lockTimeout) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Renews a lock on a message that makes it invisible from other receivers in the queue. This method is usually used to extend the message processing time.
      Parameters:
      message - a message to extend its lock.
      lockTimeout - a locking timeout in milliseconds.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.

    • complete

      void complete(MessageEnvelope message) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Permanently removes a message from the queue. This method is usually used to remove the message after successful processing.
      Parameters:
      message - a message to remove.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.

    • abandon

      void abandon(MessageEnvelope message) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Returns message into the queue and makes it available for all subscribers to receive it again. This method is usually used to return a message which could not be processed at the moment to repeat the attempt. Messages that cause unrecoverable errors shall be removed permanently or/and send to dead letter queue.
      Parameters:
      message - a message to return.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.

    • moveToDeadLetter

      void moveToDeadLetter(MessageEnvelope message) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Permanently removes a message from the queue and sends it to dead letter queue.
      Parameters:
      message - a message to be removed.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.

    • listen

      void listen(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context, IMessageReceiver receiver) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Listens for incoming messages and blocks the current thread until queue is closed.
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      receiver - a receiver to receive incoming messages.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.
      See Also:
      • IMessageReceiver
      • receive(IContext, long)

    • beginListen

      void beginListen(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context, IMessageReceiver receiver)
      Listens for incoming messages without blocking the current thread.
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      receiver - a receiver to receive incoming messages.
      See Also:
      • listen(IContext, IMessageReceiver)
      • IMessageReceiver

    • endListen

      void endListen(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException
      Ends listening for incoming messages. When this method is call listen() unblocks the thread and execution continues.
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.ApplicationException - when error occured.
